page.title: 19Transport Facilities
page.content: There is no public transport except one bus passing via Old Churchstoke to Shrewsbury ,once a week during school termtime. Nearest bus stop to the village is a mile.{Households have one {or more vehicles}-often including Land Rovers. Parents have to chauffeur children to all leisure activities. Powys C.C. supply the school bus & taxis to take pupils to school. A voluntary car scheme operates. Mobile Library visits on alternate Fridays. Videos can be hired from the local milkman who delivers 4 times a week. Bread is delivered once a week to Hyssington. The milk tanker collects milk from 4 farms daily. Mail delivery & collection daily. Dustbins are emptied every two weeks. We have three travelling hairdressers and one beautician. There is no sewerage system !
